${ModID}:ArtilleryCargo.NAME: Artillery Cargo
${ModID}:ArtilleryCargo.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy.

${ModID}:Avalanche.NAME: Avalanche
${ModID}:Avalanche.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.{!M!|>0= When Retained, increase its damage by !M! this combat.}

${ModID}:Better.NAME: Better
${ModID}:Better.DESCRIPTION: {@@}At the start of each turn, add !M! randomly snowpunk:Assembled snowpunk:Invention{!M!|>1=s} into your hand.
${ModID}:Better.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: {@@}At the start of each turn, add !M! randomly snowpunk:Assembled snowpunk:Creation{!M!|>1=s} into your hand.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: {@@}At the start of each turn, add !M! randomly snowpunk:Assembled snowpunk:Machination{!M!|>1=s} into your hand.

${ModID}:BlackIce.NAME: Black Ice
${ModID}:BlackIce.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Apply snowpunk:S{!M!|>0= + !M!} snowpunk:Chill, snowpunk:S{!M!|>0= + !M!} Weak, and snowpunk:S{!M!|>0= + !M!} Vulnerable.{!Snowpunk:Info!|0= NL Exhaust.}
${ModID}:BlackIce.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: {@@}Apply snowpunk:S{!M!|>0= + !M!} snowpunk:Chill, snowpunk:S{!M!|>0= + !M!} Weak, and snowpunk:S{!M!|>0= + !M!} Vulnerable to ALL enemies.{!Snowpunk:Info!|0= NL Exhaust.}

${ModID}:BoltShot.NAME: Bolt Shot
${ModID}:BoltShot.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Weak. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable.

${ModID}:BrassKnuckles.NAME: Brass Knuckles
${ModID}:BrassKnuckles.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage twice. NL Apply !M! snowpunk:Burn.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage twice. NL Apply !M! snowpunk:Chill.
Deal !D! damage 3 times. NL Apply !M! snowpunk:Burn.
Deal !D! damage 3 times. NL Apply !M! snowpunk:Chill.

${ModID}:BrassWave.NAME: Brass Wave
${ModID}:BrassWave.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage and gain !B! Block X{!Snowpunk:Info!|1= + 1} times.

${ModID}:Breakthrough.NAME: Breakthrough
${ModID}:Breakthrough.DESCRIPTION: {@@}The next {!M!|>1=!M! }card{!M!|>1=s} you play cost{!M!|1=s} 0 and snowpunk:Tinker{!M!|1=s} {!M!|1=itself|@=themselves}. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:Breakthrough.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: {@@}The next {!M!|>1=!M! }card{!M!|>1=s} you play cost{!M!|1=s} 0 and snowpunk:Tinker{!M!|1=s} {!M!|1=itself|@=themselves}. NL snowpunk:Tinker this card.

${ModID}:BuckShot.NAME: Buck Shot
${ModID}:BuckShot.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage randomly dispersed to ALL enemies.
${ModID}:BuckShot.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage randomly dispersed to ALL enemies. NL Applies !M! snowpunk:Burn on hit.

${ModID}:BurningFury.NAME: Burning Fury
${ModID}:BurningFury.DESCRIPTION: Add !M! snowpunk:Fireballs NL to your hand.

${ModID}:Caroling.NAME: Caroling
${ModID}:Caroling.DESCRIPTION: {@@}At the start of your turn, increase snowpunk:Holiday Cheer by !Snowpunk:M2! and draw {!M!|1=a card.|>1=!M! cards.}

${ModID}:Cauterize.NAME: Cauterize
${ModID}:Cauterize.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply snowpunk:Burn equal to unblocked damage dealt.
${ModID}:Cauterize.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Ignores Block. NL Apply snowpunk:Burn equal to unblocked damage dealt.

${ModID}:ChooChoo.NAME: Choo Choo
${ModID}:ChooChoo.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Play all Linked cards in your hand. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:ChristmasCookies.NAME: Christmas Cookies
${ModID}:ChristmasCookies.DESCRIPTION: Increase snowpunk:Holiday Cheer by !M!. snowpunk:Christmas Spirit heals !Snowpunk:M2! additional HP.

${ModID}:ChuckTools.NAME: Chuck Parts
${ModID}:ChuckTools.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to ALL enemies. NL Gain !M! snowpunk:Spare_Parts. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:ChuckTools.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable to ALL enemies. NL Gain !M! snowpunk:Spare_Parts. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:ChuggaChugga.NAME: Chugga Chugga
${ModID}:ChuggaChugga.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL snowpunk:Link two cards in your hand.

${ModID}:ColdWind.NAME: Cold Wind
${ModID}:ColdWind.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: {@@}Apply !M! snowpunk:Chill{!Snowpunk:Info!|1= and !Snowpunk:M2! Weak} to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:ColdSnap.NAME: Cold Snap
${ModID}:ColdSnap.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Ã— snowpunk:S damage and apply snowpunk:S snowpunk:Frostbite to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Comburstion.NAME: Comburstion
${ModID}:Comburstion.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply !M! snowpunk:Burn to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:Create.NAME: Create
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Add a randomly snowpunk:Assembled snowpunk:Creation into your hand.
Add a randomly snowpunk:Assembled snowpunk:Machination into your hand.

${ModID}:Defend.NAME: Defend
${ModID}:Defend.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Gain !B! Block.{!Snowpunk:Info!|1= NL Block is not removed at the start of your next turn.}

${ModID}:EngineOffload.NAME: Engine Offload
${ModID}:EngineOffload.DESCRIPTION: {@@}snowpunk:Stabilize your snowpunk:Engine. snowpunk:Condense ALL snowpunk:Evaporated cards.{!Snowpunk:Info!|0= NL Exhaust.}
${ModID}:EngineOffload.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, snowpunk:Stabilize your snowpunk:Engine. snowpunk:Condense ALL snowpunk:Evaporated cards.

${ModID}:FireAndBrimstone.NAME: Fire and Brimstone
${ModID}:FireAndBrimstone.DESCRIPTION: {@@}{!Snowpunk:Info!|1=Innate. NL }At the start of each turn, add !M! *Fireball{!M!|>1=s} into your hand.

${ModID}:Gift.NAME: Gift
${ModID}:Gift.DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 of !M! random cards of any color to add to your hand. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:Gift.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 of !M! random cards of any color to add to your hand. NL It costs 0 this turn. NL Exhaust.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 of !M! random cards of any color to add to your hand.
Choose 1 of !M! random cards of any color to add to your hand. NL It costs 0 this turn.

${ModID}:Hail.NAME: Hail
${ModID}:Hail.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage and apply snowpunk:S{!M!|>0= + !M!} snowpunk:Chill to a random enemy snowpunk:S{!M!|>0= + !M!} times.

${ModID}:Harder.NAME: Harder
${ModID}:Harder.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! snowpunk:Chill. NL If this kills an enemy, gain 1 snowpunk:Ice.

${ModID}:HeatTransfer.NAME: Heat Transfer
${ModID}:HeatTransfer.DESCRIPTION: snowpunk:Hot and snowpunk:Overheated Attacks apply !M! snowpunk:Burn.
${ModID}:HeatTransfer.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate NL snowpunk:Hot and snowpunk:Overheated Attacks apply !M! snowpunk:Burn.

${ModID}:IceCube.NAME: Ice Cube
${ModID}:IceCube.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! snowpunk:Ice. NL Exhausts if snowpunk:Heated.

${ModID}:IceWall.NAME: Ice Wall
${ModID}:IceWall.DESCRIPTION: When you draw this card, gain 1 snowpunk:Ice.
${ModID}:IceWall.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: When you draw this card, gain 1 snowpunk:Ice and snowpunk:Freeze your snowpunk:Engine.

${ModID}:IcicleSpear.NAME: Icicle Spear
${ModID}:IcicleSpear.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL snowpunk:Cool this card.
${ModID}:IcicleSpear.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! snowpunk:Chill. NL snowpunk:Cool this card.

${ModID}:Invent.NAME: Invent
${ModID}:Invent.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Fleeting. NL snowpunk:Assemble a{!Snowpunk:Info!|0=n snowpunk:Invention|1= snowpunk:Creation|>1= snowpunk:Machination}.

${ModID}:MadScience.NAME: Mad Science
${ModID}:MadScience.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card, Upgrade !M! random card{!M!|>1=s} in your hand for the rest of combat.{@@}
${ModID}:MadScience.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever you play a card, Upgrade !M! random card{!M!|>1=s} in your hand for the rest of combat.{@@}

${ModID}:NorEaster.NAME: Nor'Easter
${ModID}:NorEaster.DESCRIPTION: {@@}{!Snowpunk:Info!|1=Innate. NL }snowpunk:Freeze your hand. NL snowpunk:Freeze your snowpunk:Engine. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:NorEaster.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: {@@}{!Snowpunk:Info!|1=Innate. NL }snowpunk:Freeze ALL cards. NL snowpunk:Freeze your snowpunk:Engine. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:NutCracker.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage{!Snowpunk:M2!|>1= !Snowpunk:M2! times}. NL Apply !M! Weak. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable.

${ModID}:Overblown.NAME: Overblown
${ModID}:Overblown.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If this kills an enemy, gain 1 snowpunk:Steam.

${ModID}:Overdrive.DESCRIPTION: Whenever a card snowpunk:Evaporates, draw !M! card{!M!|>1=s}{@@}.
${ModID}:Overdrive.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever a card snowpunk:Evaporates, draw !M! card{!M!|>1=s}{@@}.

${ModID}:PiercingRound.NAME: Piercing Round
${ModID}:PiercingRound.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Ignores Block.

${ModID}:PressureValves.NAME: Pressure Valves
${ModID}:PressureValves.DESCRIPTION: Card effects act as if you have !M! more snowpunk:Snowballs.
${ModID}:PressureValves.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Card effects act as if you have {@@}X{!M!|>0= + !M!} more snowpunk:Snowballs.

${ModID}:Refrigerate.NAME: Refrigerate
${ModID}:Refrigerate.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL snowpunk:Cool this card.
${ModID}:Refrigerate.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL snowpunk:Cool this card. NL When Retained, increase its Block by !M! this combat.

${ModID}:ReleaseValve.NAME: Release Valve

${ModID}:Resupply.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Cards drawn this way are Upgraded for the rest of combat.

${ModID}:Scald.NAME: Scald

${ModID}:Scald.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage twice. NL Apply !M! snowpunk:Burn{!Snowpunk:Info!|1= to ALL enemies}.

${ModID}:Singe.NAME: Singe
${ModID}:Singe.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Next turn, gain !M! snowpunk:Fireballs.

${ModID}:Sledding.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block for each enemy hit. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:Snowbowl.NAME: Snowbowl
${ModID}:Snowbowl.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply !M! snowpunk:Chill to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:SnowFort.NAME: Snow Fort
${ModID}:SnowFort.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Next turn, gain !M! snowpunk:Snowballs.

${ModID}:SteamBlast.NAME: Steam Blast
${ModID}:SteamBlast.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage twice. Gain !M! snowpunk:Steam.{!Snowpunk:Info!|0= NL snowpunk:Evaporate.}

${ModID}:SteamForm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of your turn, gain !M! snowpunk:Steam.

${ModID}:TheEmperor.NAME: The Emperor
${ModID}:TheEmperor.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies !M! times.

${ModID}:ThermalShock.NAME: Thermal Shock
${ModID}:ThermalShock.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! snowpunk:Burn and !Snowpunk:M2! snowpunk:Chill to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:TheSnowman.NAME: The Snowman
${ModID}:TheSnowman.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL ALL cards become snowpunk:Frosty.

${ModID}:Think.NAME: Think

${ModID}:Think.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL snowpunk:Tinker this card.

${ModID}:ThinkingChamber.NAME: Thinking Chamber
${ModID}:ThinkingChamber.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Gain !Snowpunk:M2! snowpunk:Ice. NL snowpunk:Tinker !M! card{!M!|>1=s} in your hand.

EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: {@@}snowpunk:Tinker a card in your hand.{!Location!|4,-2= NL Upon pickup, Upgrade a card in your deck.}

${ModID}:TrolleyForm.NAME: Trolley Form

${ModID}:TheCryogenizer.NAME: The Cryogenizer

${ModID}:TheCryogenizer.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL snowpunk:Condense !M! random cards to your hand.

${ModID}:WaterTank.NAME: Water Tank

${ModID}:Wildfire.NAME: Wildfire

${ModID}:Wildfire.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL {@@}At the start of your turn, snowpunk:Heat !M! random card{!M!|>1=s} in your hand.

${ModID}:WinterStorm.NAME: Winter Storm
${ModID}:WinterStorm.DESCRIPTION: {@@}At the start of your turn, gain !M! snowpunk:Snowball{!M!|>1=s} and lose {!M!|-1,1=[E]|2=[E] [E]|3=[E] [E] [E]|@=!M! [E]}.
${ModID}:WinterStorm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: snowpunk:Freeze your snowpunk:Engine. NL {@@}At the start of your turn, gain !M! snowpunk:Snowball{!M!|>1=s} and lose {!M!|-1,1=[E]|2=[E] [E]|3=[E] [E] [E]|@=!M! [E]}.
